Title:	Dwarf	Galaxies	with	Optical	Signatures	of	Active	Massive	Black	Holes				
Authors:	Reines	"A.E.,"	Greene	"J.E.,"	Geha	M.								
Table:	BPT	AGN	and	Composites:	Galaxy	Properties								
================================================================================														
Byte-by-byte	Description	of	file:	apj483740t1_mrt.txt										
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------														
	Bytes	Format	Units	Label	Explanations									
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------														
	-1	3	I3	---	ID	Running	identification	number	-1					
	5	A1	---	f_ID	[abcd]	Flag	on	ID	-2					
	-7	12	I6	---	NSAID	NASA-Sloan	Atlas	identification	number					
	-14	32	A19	---	SDSS	SDSS	identification							
	-34	47	A14	---	P-MJD-F	Plate-MJD-Fiber	of	SDSS	spectrum					
	-49	54	F6.4	---	z	Redshift	-3							
	-56	59	F4.2	[solMass]	mass	Log	of	the	stellar	mass	-3			
	-61	66	F6.2	mag	gMag	Absolute	g-band	magnitude	-3					
	-68	72	F5.2	mag	g-r	The	(g-r)	color	-3					
	-74	77	F4.2	kpc	r50	Petrosian	50%	light	radius	-3				
	-79	83	F5.3	---	n	Sersic	index	-3						
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------														
Note	(1):	ID	numbers	Jan-35	are	BPT	AGN	and	ID	numbers	36-136	are	BPT	composites.
Note	(2):													
	a	=	Galaxies	in	Barth	et	al.	(2008);						
	b	=	Galaxies	in	Greene	&	Ho	(2007a)	and	Dong	et	al.	(2012);	
	c	=	NGC	4395	(Filippenko	&	Sargent	1989;	Filippenko	&	Ho	2003);		
	d	=	Galaxy	in	Dong	et	al.	(2007).						
Note	(3):	All	values	are	from	the	NSA	and	assume	h	=	0.73.	Magnitudes	are
	K-corrected	to	rest-frame	values	using	kcorrect	v4	2	and	corrected				
	for	foreground	Galactic	extinction.
